components.name: BarChartComponent

inputsClass.name: chartId
inputsClass.rawdescription: Value of the id attribute present on the <canvas> tag element the chart
inputsClass.description: Value of the id attribute present on the tag element the chart

inputsClass.name: colourSet
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Used to choose the colour set of the charts as defined in the Figma prototypes.
7 colour sets are currently defined:
- Default 0 corresponds to the current one
- 1 to 6 corresponds to the "new" [colour sets](https://www.figma.com/file/Hn6PyvnR385Ta0XN3KqOI9/04.-Dataviz---Documentation-(read-only)?type=design&node-id=1-69316&mode=design&t=sDytQ5BipsryWkuA-0)
Note: All the sets are defined in /src/services/patterns/ChartDesign.ts
inputsClass.description:
Used to choose the colour set of the charts as defined in the Figma prototypes. 7 colour sets are currently defined:

  • Default 0 corresponds to the current one
  • 1 to 6 corresponds to the "new" colour sets Note: All the sets are defined in /src/services/patterns/ChartDesign.ts

inputsClass.name: datasets
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Value of the `datasets` key present in the `data` object passed to the Chart config
If it's the stacked barchart (stacked : true in props), each dataset may contain the stack it belongs. stack Zero if not defined
inputsClass.description: Value of the datasets key present in the data object passed to the Chart config If it's the stacked barchart (stacked : true in props), each dataset may contain the stack it belongs. stack Zero if not defined

inputsClass.name: disableAccessibility
inputsClass.rawdescription: Disable accessibility patterns
inputsClass.description: Disable accessibility patterns

inputsClass.name: enableHoverFeature
inputsClass.rawdescription: Enable hover feature (may cause strange behavior when used with width and height in %)
inputsClass.description: Enable hover feature (may cause strange behavior when used with width and height in %)

inputsClass.name: height
inputsClass.rawdescription: Value of the `height` css property used to define the height of the <canvas> element
inputsClass.description: Value of the height css property used to define the height of the element

inputsClass.name: labels
inputsClass.rawdescription: Labels used to label the index axis (default x axes). See [Data structures documentation](https://www.chartjs.org/docs/latest/general/data-structures.html)
inputsClass.description: Labels used to label the index axis (default x axes). See Data structures documentation

inputsClass.name: newPatternsOrder
inputsClass.rawdescription:
6 patterns exist and are not randomly given but follow the order defined in [patternsStandardList](/src/services/patterns/ChartDesign.ts)
Additionally, a pattern has only one possible colour per colour set as defined in the Figma prototype.
In some use cases, the chart may need to show a different orders of these patterns, this can be changed using the props newPatternsOrder
inputsClass.description: 6 patterns exist and are not randomly given but follow the order defined in patternsStandardList Additionally, a pattern has only one possible colour per colour set as defined in the Figma prototype. In some use cases, the chart may need to show a different orders of these patterns, this can be changed using the props newPatternsOrder

inputsClass.name: plugins
inputsClass.rawdescription: Value of the `plugins` key passed to the Chart config
inputsClass.description: Value of the plugins key passed to the Chart config

inputsClass.name: stacked
inputsClass.rawdescription: Activates "stacked" mode
inputsClass.description: Activates "stacked" mode

inputsClass.name: styles
inputsClass.rawdescription: Add custom CSS styles to the <canvas> element
inputsClass.description: Add custom CSS styles to the element

inputsClass.name: tooltipFirstLineLabel
inputsClass.rawdescription: Label of the first line in the Tooltip
inputsClass.description: Label of the first line in the Tooltip

inputsClass.name: tooltipSecondLineLabel
inputsClass.rawdescription: Label of the second line in the Tooltip
inputsClass.description: Label of the second line in the Tooltip

inputsClass.name: unit
inputsClass.rawdescription: Unit of values on canvas Y axis
inputsClass.description: Unit of values on canvas Y axis

inputsClass.name: width
inputsClass.rawdescription: Value of the `width` css property used to define the width of the <canvas> element
inputsClass.description: Value of the width css property used to define the width of the element

inputsClass.name: xAxisTitle
inputsClass.rawdescription: X axis title
inputsClass.description: X axis title

inputsClass.name: yAxisTitle
inputsClass.rawdescription: Y axis title
inputsClass.description: Y axis title
